statement.p: Vasya's initial salary is 62000. If she receives a raise of 5800 each year, what is the first year her salary is greater (or equal to) 100,000?

solution.p: Her salary must increase more than 100,000-62000 = 38000. This will take \displaystyle\frac{{38000}}{{5800}}={6.551724137931} years. Because she won't be more than 100,000 until the final, full year that is 7 years.
